name: freya
description: Huella Deportiva's Public Website dubbed: Huella Deportiva Web
author: MJOLNIR

scripts.build:gcloud: npm run clean:dist && npm run build
scripts.deploy:gcloud: gcloud app deploy app.yml --project huella-deportiva-web && gcloud app browse --project=huella-deportiva-web
scripts.deploy: npm run build:gcloud && npm run deploy:gcloud
